Exercises



An application that allows you to track your daily or weakly exercise routine. Add exercises and keep track of how many exercises you did! Add an exercise to your tracker! Type in a unique name and click add to include it in your list. Update the number of times you have performed each exercise. Input numbers in the above white spaces for each exercise and click update to see them added to your totals. Carefull the Exercise tracker remembers your previous numbers, don't carelessly click update! Type in how much of this exercise you did today! Click the update button bellow to add it to your total and log the exercise! Careful, numbers only! Click to remove an exercise from your list. Careful this is permanent and cannot be undone! Click to see your progress over time represented in graph format. Displays the total amount of times you've done this exercise. Click to close the graph view and go back to the list of your exercises. Click to show the graph for this exercise.
